articles.title: Nvidia shares sink as Chinese AI app DeepSeek spooks US markets - BBC.com
articles.description: Share prices in US and European firms fall as the Chinese technology threatens to disrupt the AI industry.
articles.content:
Peter Hoskins & Imran Rahman-JonesBusiness & technology reporters
US tech giant Nvidia lost over a sixth of its value after the surging popularity of a Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) a… [+5145 chars]
